mapper.select: SELECT BLOG_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT, CREATE_DT, MODIFY_DT, USER_NO, EMAIL FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.BLOG_NO DESC) AS RN , B.BLOG_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.HIT, B.CREATE_DT, B.MODIFY_DT , U.USER_NO, U.EMAIL FROM USER_T U INNER JOIN BLOG_T B ON U.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT B.BLOG_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.HIT, B.CREATE_DT, B.MODIFY_DT , U.USER_NO, U.EMAIL FROM USER_T U INNER JOIN BLOG_T B ON U.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE B.BLOG_NO = #{blogNo}
